types.html:
minimum syndical m (usually uncountable, plural minimums syndicaux)

  1. bare minimum, the least one can get away with
    Synonym: strict minimum
    En effet, les graphismes de ce jeu vidéo font dans le minimum syndical. ― In fact, the graphics of this game have been kept to the bare minimum.
trans: bare minimum, the least one can get away with
bare minimum, the least one can get away with

title: minimum syndical
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /mi.ni.mɔm sɛ̃.di.kal/
